Malice:
 
The male followed and sat on the bed next to Blacknightmare.  He put an arm around her and hugged her, smiling slightly.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

"Yes"she said sweetly and with a big smile, she sat down in her bed 
and  she invited him to do the same

wrote:
> Malice:
